entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers changing to 40 percent chance of rain showers this morning. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Wind becoming south 30 km/h this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. Snow mixed with rain beginning this evening. Wind south 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain or snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
